Posts.EditableText:
I Now Put up BT's Server much Earlier then anticipated, Mostly because the Quest Community could use one!.

The BT Game will still be Built around the Server and BT Will improve and advance from there.


To Learn more about The BT Server go here: [url:2unik4x5]http://s11.invisionfree.com/Black_Label/index.php?showtopic=13&st=0[/url:2unik4x5]

To Connect Directly to the server, make sure you have a Free copy of Quest, Then click on this link: [url:2unik4x5]qnet://c-67-183-139-58.hsd1.wa.comcast.net:[/url:2unik4x5]

Remember click on the First Link first to learn more, Thank you.
